favourite.article: As for the saints they are the excellent! Currently on a road trip to Yosemite with the saints and we've been listening to this song again and again. We testify that Jesus is Lord, and no good have we beyond our God!!
Thank You Lord for the saints! For they are the excellent!
You are my Lord! No good have I beyond You!
Lord thank You for preserving us in Your recovery. It's a blessing that we are kept in His recovery. He is our Lord and refuge. LORD PRESERVE US TIL YOUR COMING BACK.
Praise the Lord for Psalm 16. It is so great that the Lord preserves us as His delights. He is our refuge in our church life when we experience the cross.
